column1: Are Chris Goulding and Jock Landale NBA material?
[@KeithSmithNBA] Jock Landale signed a two-year contract for the minimum with the San Antonio Spurs. 2021-22 is fully guaranteed and 2022-23 is fully non-guaranteed.
Australian center Jock Landale — the 2021 NBL Grand Final MVP — has agreed to a two-year deal with the San Antonio Spurs, his agent Sammy Wloszczowski of @SIGSports tells @TheAthletic @Stadium.
